user_query: I'm planning a family trip and we want to minimize our carbon footprint. Can you calculate the carbon footprint of our flight? Also, I'd like to know the air quality health index of our destination and the necessary vaccinations for our travel.

TaskList.description: Calculate the carbon footprint of the flight based on the distance and type of aircraft.
Retrieve the air quality health index for the destination location.
Gather information on necessary vaccinations for the destination country.
